findings.title: bitcciCash tokens can be sent to a blacklisted address
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function only checks for blacklisting on the sender's address and not on the recipient's address, allowing bitcciCash tokens to be sent to a blacklisted address.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of bitcciCash tokens
findings.description: The MINTER_ROLE address can mint bitcciCash tokens to any ethereum address without limit until the total supply cap is reached.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade by MINTER_ROLE and PAUSER_ROLE
findings.description: The MINTER_ROLE and PAUSER_ROLE can be given to any address/account by the deployer (DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) of bitcciCash contract, which may lead to potential unauthorized script upgrades.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized pause of token transfers by PAUSER_ROLE
findings.description: The account with a PAUSER_ROLE can pause the transfer of tokens using the pause() function.
